Description:
Introduction:This vacant position is for an international company opening up it’s third party global outsourcing office; expected to be fully operational in Dubai October 2023! The company is one of North America’s leading carriers and specialize in the transportation and logistics industry. They are growing in many areas and are searching for talented individuals to lead their team!*This is an in-office, permanent, full-time role in Dubai, UAE.Position Summary:The Accounts Payable Clerk will be responsible for providing support in the administrative and payable functional areas within the finance team. The ideal candidate has strong communication skills, pays attention to details and can multi-task in a fast-paced environment.Direct Report:·    Finance ManagerDuties & Responsibilities:Assists Team/Supervisor with general accounting administration
Performs clerical duties, such as maintains filing and record systems
Prepare Work with Finance Manager to produce any required ad-hoc reports
Monitoring and processing Accounts Payable Cheque Runs/EFT’s
Processing payroll for intercompany divisions
Handling all internal billings
Filing and indexing all documents physically and electronically
Oversee and monitor the corporate company process
Provide metrics and specific reporting to senior management
Data entry and reporting
Assist with driver & intercompany payroll inquiries
Reconciling vendor accounts
Maintain bookkeeping, account balances
Responsible for Driver Runsheet indexing and processing
Process Driver payroll register run
Repair maintenance & fuel processingJob Offer:Full-time (Permanent).Skills
Skills:
